name: Morpheus In The Underworld
description:
Morpheus In The Underworld is a rhythm game

INSTRUCTIONS

Arrow keys to move.

Z to attack, but only on the beat! (Keep an eye on the red orb)

C to defend yourself against syncopated attacks.

DEVLOG

Our devlog by @edbucks, (https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2019/topic/384789/devblog-morpheus-...)
